title: encountered incremental compilation error with item_children(qmeta_async[ed7c]) - ICE with a proc macro

labels.name: I-ICE
labels.description: Issue: The compiler panicked, giving an Internal Compilation Error (ICE) ❄️

labels.name: T-compiler
labels.description: Relevant to the compiler team, which will review and decide on the PR/issue.

body:
### Code I'm not sure what triggers this. It shows up, suddenly, in CI. I don't have it on my local machine. Since this is an unstable fingerprints related issue (#84970), I'm not clearing the CI cache until you folks have an idea how to proceed! https://gitlab.com/whisperfish/whisperfish/-/jobs/1604136167 https://gitlab.com/whisperfish/whisperfish branch `sfdk`. ### Meta [`rustc --version --verbose`](https://gitlab.com/whisperfish/whisperfish/-/jobs/1604136167#L867): ``` rustc 1.55.0 (c8dfcfe04 2021-09-06) ``` (coming from CI, so I'm not sure) ### Error output ``` error: internal compiler error: encountered incremental compilation error with item_children(qmeta_async[ed7c]) | = help: This is a known issue with the compiler. Run `cargo clean -p harbour_whisperfish` or `cargo clean` to allow your project to compile = note: Please follow the instructions below to create a bug report with the provided information = note: See for more information thread 'rustc' panicked at 'Found unstable fingerprints for item_children(qmeta_async[ed7c]): [Export { ident: with_executor#0, res: Def(Macro(Attr), DefId(240:7 ~ qmeta_async[ed7c]::with_executor)), span: /builds/bWox63RA/1/whisperfish/whisperfish/qmeta-async/src/lib.rs:5:1: 8:29 (#0), vis: Public }]', /rustc/c8dfcfe046a7680554bf4eb612bad840e7631c4b/compiler/rustc_query_system/src/query/plumbing.rs:624:9 ```
Backtrace

``` error: internal compiler error: encountered incremental compilation error with item_children(qmeta_async[ed7c]) | = help: This is a known issue with the compiler. clone 67: 0x0 - error: internal compiler error: unexpected panic note: the compiler unexpectedly panicked. this is a bug. note: we would appreciate a bug report: https://github.com/rust-lang/rust/issues/new?labels=C-bug%2C+I-ICE%2C+T-compiler&template=ice.md note: rustc 1.55.0 (c8dfcfe04 2021-09-06) running on x86_64-unknown-linux-gnu note: compiler flags: -C embed-bitcode=no -C debuginfo=2 -C incremental --crate-type lib note: some of the compiler flags provided by cargo are hidden query stack during panic: #0 [item_children] collecting child items of `qmeta_async` #1 [visible_parent_map] calculating the visible parent map #2 [eval_to_const_value_raw] simplifying constant for the type system `config::settings::::default::CppClosureInput::Input::{constant#0}` #3 [collect_mod_item_types] collecting item types in module `config::settings` #4 [analysis] running analysis passes on this crate end of query stack error: could not compile `harbour-whisperfish` due to previous error ```
